me suwisheshi awasthawehi wu wadagath kama dana sitiyak men dadayakkaraya da thama urahisa mathawu puthrayage dakunatha ee matha thabu thama wamathin dadi lesa mirika gaththe, hisa semin osawa ohuge dasa desa eka elle balamini.depasa wu pahan yuwalin wihidunu dubala kahawan aalokayen dilisunu maha dadayakkarayage neth piri thibune keweni agrayen nikmi kopul thala osse gala yamata ithama aasanna wu mahath kandulakini.ee dutu dadayakkaraya nawatha warak thama nethata nangi kandula walaka ganu was deneth thadin piyagena iwathata haruneya.thama piyanan nokadawa sihin handin mathurana githikawak wan wu manthraye ridmayanukula swaraya, mawage hisa addara mati biththiyata waru wi papuwa matha banda gath dathin, piyawunu nethin saha bimata harawunu hisin yuthuwa wadi wi hun dadayakkarayage sitha nidrawata path karawana nalawili githayak bandu wi.mese nidi lowata wareka piwisemin, nawatha awadi wemin, gewu kalaya kopamanakdayi pawasimata ohu da nodanna kalantharayakata pasu hadisiye ohu ekwanama awadi wuye kisiwaku urahisa matha atha thaba kala selawimakini.ekwarama thama me sitinuye kohedayi nishchaya karagatha nohunu dadayakkaraya, hisa kihipawarak solawa nidi andura denethin palawa harimin hisa esawiya.
